name: Bard and his friends
description:
====ABOUT GAME====

You are bard. Combine two music notes to make a stronger music note. Overcome different problems with your beautiful voice and little friends.

====CONTROL====

Move / Shoot direction<-- Arrow Key

Jump <-- Space

Shoot <-- Z (can shoot toward 8 direction)

Open the door <-- E

==== MEMBER ====

Art : beijubird

Program : cc7imm7
